name: Absent (itch) (Reshad Scott)
description:
"Shh shh be quiet. It can hear us. Did you see it? Please come find us."

A young girl named Rachel, finds herself searching for her friend lost in the woods after receiving a disturbing voicemail that her friend could be in danger. Throughout the search she comes across voice boxes with messages left in place of her friend, in which she finds out that she is not alone.

Beware that if you die, you will have to start from the beginning.
